3: The dozen of tall Constructs stand out conspicuously in the crowd. Staessen picks you and the others out in a glance.
You're back.
Apologies for my unauthorized departure, Captain Staessen, but 【kuroname】 and I brought Rosetta and her companions back.
Apology accepted.
And now... my turn for an apology for what I'm about to say.
To tell you the truth, I just had a private exchange with representatives from other settlements.
We have agreed to absolve you of the 'sinner' status, but only under certain conditions.
Thank goodness...!
So... I guess this hinges on the conditions?
Indeed.
This works better for us as well. Knowing our reputation in the ARU, absolving us so lightly must've ruffled a few feathers.
...Indeed. I wanted to announce it publicly, but I was acting out of turn.
So, what are the conditions?
You must retrieve two 'Moses class' icebreakers from the Border Commune.
Border Commune?
Icebreakers?
Retrieve?
If you can complete this mission, the icebreakers will be immediately put to work establishing a new settlement for the Forest Guards.
In the new settlement, Forest Guards will be regarded as equal members of the ARU.
Very well. This should be enough to win respect for the Forest Guards.
But before that, I think you need to explain to our guests here first.
